overview: A girl tried to find someone to repair her broken doll. She ended up at a workshop owned by a craftsman. Even though the craftsman couldn't help with the damage repair of the original doll, he took out an half-way-done one and finished the work. This brought up many memories of his childhood when he used to create crafts with his father. In the end, the craftsman kindly gave the doll to the girl. She was very greatful and had a new doll friend again.
title: Lost and Found
